com.radaee.pdf

Class HWriting

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radaee.pdf.HWriting
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class HWriting
extends java.lang.Object
    class for hand-writing ink.
    not same to Ink class, this class has max line width and min line width.
    so the line in HWriting will not in same width.

      • HWriting

        public HWriting(int w,
                int h,
                float min_w,
                float max_w,
                int clr_r,
                int clr_g,
                int clr_b)
        Deprecated. 
        constructor for hand-writing.
        Parameters:
        w - width of cache.
        h - height of cache.
        min_w - min-width for ink width.
        max_w - max-width for ink width.
        clr_r - r values of ink color [0-255]
        clr_g - g values of ink color [0-255]
        clr_b - b values of ink color [0-255]
